评论详情: The dress was too short, was missing the ribbon belt, & the material was worn & cheap.

评论概述: pretty vintage but side zipper gets stuck
评论详情: My daughter finds this vintage butterfly dress comfortable. Love the mix of black lace with the nude-khaki skirt and smooth black top. The size Small's a good fit on her petite rectangular figure that wears a size Small or 4-6 in dresses. The black top & skirted bottom defines her waist more. Very pretty. She wears this with flat black ballet shoes to complete the look.  Greatly recommended.

This was a great dress for my 13yo who loves vintage and fancy dresses. You should know that the waist is quite high, and it has a wide cut that looks awkward without the belt. It fits her very well (she is tall and thin), but I think it wouldn't be a great cut for anyone large-busted. She says it's very comfortable for her, though!  The fabric itself is pretty thin. It tore the first day she wore it, although she was being a bit rough, crawling on the floor to retrieve a Christmas present from under the tree. Luckily she sews and it tore in a place that was easily mendable. She likes it enough that it was worth it for her!
The top was laying on my midriff instead of my waist. Ribbon missing that was shown on the photo. Not worth the price. I would pay less than $24 Pregnant so bought XL.
